summary: Adds a fully voice-acted NPC to Riverwood that opens the ShowRaceMenu - for a price.
descriptionHtml:
Seriously, read this stuff.

CHANGING YOUR RACE WILL RESET YOUR SKILLS, STATS, AND PERKS. Changing Gender is just otherwise risky. 

Pointed out by Matekun:
Anytime you use the Show Race Menu, all of your euipment\'s active effects (enchantments) are disabled until you unequip and equip all of it again. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION:

This is a small mod I\'ve been working on to learn the CK.

It adds a new fully voice-acted NPC to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood that, upon paying 500 gold, will open the Race Menu. This was made to add a more \"lore friendly\" way of changing your character\'s appearance. 

The NPC in question is a Male Argonian named \"Nicks-The-Ear\" wearing a mage outfit. He shares the same AI Packages as Embry, so can usually be found wandering around, and inside the Inn. If not, just look for him in places you\'d usually find Embry. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
Download with NMM like everything else, or:
Drop the files and .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder. Activate the .esp. 

UNINSTALLATION:
Uninstall with NMM like everything else, or:
Remove the files and .esp from your Data folder. Make sure you only remove what I added.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERSION HISTORY:
V0.1 Release
V0.1a Fixed small dialogue bug
V0.1b Realized my stupidity - Added scripts to file
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FUTURE UPDATES:
I intend to give him his own shop
I intend to expand his dialogue
I intend to add a small just-for-fun quest
Find a workaround for the possible negative effects of the menu.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS:
Nextermastermind - Voice Acting
SimsponFly - Dialogue suggestions
Mountain Dew - Stress sedative
author: Expresate
